name: 2030: Trump's America
description:
STORY

January 2018: North Korea Launches Nuclear Warheads Towards USA
February 2018: Trump Declares Marshal Law
April 2019: North Korea Defeated Marshal Law Not Ended
July 2019: Trump Declares Himself Dictator of USA
October 2020: Putin Declares Himself Soul Owner of Russia
October 2021: Putin Dies Last Will and Testament Reads All Ownership
of Russia to Trump
January 2022: Trump Removes All Enviromental Laws
December 2025: Home Nuclear Power Becomes Nation Wide
August 2026: Abnormalities Spread Across Nation
December 4 2030: Dirty Bomb Goes Off In Flint Michigan
December 5: Flint Michigan Quarantined
YOU ARE OF A SUPER POWERED FEW HELP EVAC FLINT

(Get the civilians to the chopper)

INSTRUCTIONS

Left Mouse: Lazer Eyes Uses 4 radiation/ second
Press Space: Fly  Uses 1 radiation/ second
Press Q: Drop 
Press E: Pick Up and Drop Civilian
If Radiation is above 50% You poison civilians
The more radiation the faster you are
The more radiation the stronger you are
If Radiation is above 75% you heal
If Radiation hits 110% you have a meltdown
If health falls below 0 you have a meltdown
Save as many civilians as you can GOODLUCK :)
